關於應該用射得好快定係好快就射嘅用法，小鳥醫生都有啲心大心細，但係上網search過，又真係有其他醫生咁用。不過唔好再係哩個問題度爭論，始終哩個post都係用嚟推廣關於性功能障礙嘅資訊，同埋俾有需要嘅人發問。

醫生告訴你：射得快，怎麼辦？

文/高醫生
射得快，
怎麼辦？
聽高醫生的呀！

很多小夥伴常常會跑來問小愛，射得快，要怎麼辦？其實，男生的平均時間沒有那麼長，大多數的小夥伴也根本不構成所謂早泄。但如果真的想讓自己愛愛的時間長一點，也不是沒有辦法的。今天，我們就請高醫生給大家介紹一下科學的延時方法。
一、什麼是早泄？
說起延時，就不得不先說說早泄。畢竟很多人都是因為自己「早泄」而想要延時的。
早發性射精（Premature Ejaculation）俗稱早泄，是指進行性行為時男性身寸米青過早，愛愛時間過短。而針對早泄的標準，目前尚無統一定論。醫生逐漸將夫妻雙方的滿意度作為早泄的衡量方法，所以大家也別掐着秒表盯着時間，好好練習技巧才是正道。

https://kknews.cc/zh-hk/health/mb248z9.html

個”得”字本身就有好多意思 下面係其中兩個:

1. 完成，實現：飯得了。得逞。得志（多指滿足名利的欲望）。
2. 用在動詞或形容詞後的連接補語，表示效果或程度：跑得快。香得很。

你地覺得(a) 同 (b) 有分別係因為你地兩個”得”字嘅用法唔同

(a)句嘅用法係2. 而(b)句嘅用法係1.


但係你地呢種用法冇問題唔代表另一種用法係有問題

如果你將(a)同(b)嘅”得”字理解為1.
咁樓主(a)嘅用法係完全冇問題

連登仔明就明 唔明就算

文/高醫生
射得快，
怎麼辦？
聽高醫生的呀！

很多小夥伴常常會跑來問小愛，射得快，要怎麼辦？其實，男生的平均時間沒有那麼長，大多數的小夥伴也根本不構成所謂早泄。但如果真的想讓自己愛愛的時間長一點，也不是沒有辦法的。今天，我們就請高醫生給大家介紹一下科學的延時方法。
一、什麼是早泄？
說起延時，就不得不先說說早泄。畢竟很多人都是因為自己「早泄」而想要延時的。
早發性射精（Premature Ejaculation）俗稱早泄，是指進行性行為時男性身寸米青過早，愛愛時間過短。而針對早泄的標準，目前尚無統一定論。醫生逐漸將夫妻雙方的滿意度作為早泄的衡量方法，所以大家也別掐着秒表盯着時間，好好練習技巧才是正道。

a) 射得好快
b) 好快就射得

個”得”字本身就有好多意思 下面係其中兩個:

1. 完成，實現：飯得了。得逞。得志（多指滿足名利的欲望）。
2. 用在動詞或形容詞後的連接補語，表示效果或程度：跑得快。香得很。

你地覺得(a) 同 (b) 有分別係因為你地兩個”得”字嘅用法唔同

(a)句嘅用法係2. 而(b)句嘅用法係1.


但係你地呢種用法冇問題唔代表另一種用法係有問題

如果你將(a)同(b)嘅”得”字理解為1.
咁樓主(a)嘅用法係完全冇問題

- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/2295477
https://mecfsroadmap.altervista.org/
入link按General Therapies for ME/CFS有好多療法,例如:
Reducing fatigue and increasing energy: methylphenidate, agomelatine, amantadine, amisulpride, moclobemide.
Treating post-exertional malaise: pyridostigmine

我既資料:
1.Symptoms
1.1 Main symptoms
Fat malabsorption from 2014: Only eat a small amount of fat daily because: If I eat the same amount of fat like normal people, I will fart frequently and will have loose stool.
Limbs weakness from 2012 (both hands and feet) (level: can barely cook for myself): occupational therapist diagnosed me that my hands get slow after repetitive movements. After tidying up the apartment for 45min, I have to sit for 5 hours to recover my strength. Fatigue won’t recover after ejaculation unless I take chinese medicine. Low stamina of fingers
1.2 Minor symptoms
1.2.1 Abdomen
My stomach blocked after eating whole grain.
After drinking cold water, my abdomen will feel uncomfortably cold.
Uncomfortable after drinking skim milk (can’t remember, maybe had diarrhea/ abdomen bloated).
1.2.2 Others
Hands and feet have sweat. Feet peel a lot
Impotence (hardness level: banana)

2. Medical history
2.1 Supplements
Bio-Gest by Thorne (1 capsule a meal)/ 200mg pancreatin 10X made my abdomen pain.
Probiotics (3bilion) made me have loose stools.
B vitamin complex improved my fatigue a bit, but no further improvements.
Digestin by JM (pancreatin 30mg,diastase 20mg, papin (papain?) 40mg, lysine HCl100mg, vitamin B-1 10mg) improved my fat malabsorption for 1 time out of about 7 times.
2.2 Western medicine
Haven’t have any stool tests
Haven’t drunk milk/ soy milk added with calcium daily
Fatty liver diagnosed by ultrasound. gallbladder scanned with no findings
Gastroenterologist: gastritis diagnosed in 2017 (shouldn’t have now).
Neurology: performed nerve conduction study and then excluded Myasthenia gravis
CT brain with no findings
Endocrinology: excluded Cushing's syndrome
psychiatry：citalopram (hbr) 20mg/ sertraline (HCl) 25mg/ aripiprazole 2.5mg made me constipation & didn’t help
X-ray on chest, back & neck
2.3 Homepathy
Sulphur Q1 (don’t work)
2.4 Chinese medicine
Chinese herbals (45%) & acupuncture (5%) alleviated half of my fatigue but no further improvements. Chinese herbals alleviated my diarrhoea.

3. Onset
Roughly from September 2009 to May 2011, I ate too much tortoise jelly [made from the gao/ paste of plastron (bottom shell) from the turtle & chinese herbs with cooling effects] & drank too much chinese herbal cooling tea 4 times a week for 1 month & 1 time a week for other time, to prevent acne. Masturbated 5 times for 1 week, 3 times a week for 2 weeks, 2 times a week for the other time.
From Sep 2012, started feeling weak
In May 2014, started getting severe fatigue
In June & july 2014, barely attended school. The result is getting more tired.
In Sep 2014, started to have diarrhea frequently

入link按General Therapies for ME/CFS有好多療法,例如:
Reducing fatigue and increasing energy: methylphenidate, agomelatine, amantadine, amisulpride, moclobemide.
Treating post-exertional malaise: pyridostigmine

我既資料:
1.Symptoms
1.1 Main symptoms
Fat malabsorption from 2014: Only eat a small amount of fat daily because: If I eat the same amount of fat like normal people, I will fart frequently and will have loose stool.
Limbs weakness from 2012 (both hands and feet) (level: can barely cook for myself): occupational therapist diagnosed me that my hands get slow after repetitive movements. After tidying up the apartment for 45min, I have to sit for 5 hours to recover my strength. Fatigue won’t recover after ejaculation unless I take chinese medicine. Low stamina of fingers
1.2 Minor symptoms
1.2.1 Abdomen
My stomach blocked after eating whole grain.
After drinking cold water, my abdomen will feel uncomfortably cold.
Uncomfortable after drinking skim milk (can’t remember, maybe had diarrhea/ abdomen bloated).
1.2.2 Others
Hands and feet have sweat. Feet peel a lot
Impotence (hardness level: banana)

2. Medical history
2.1 Supplements
Bio-Gest by Thorne (1 capsule a meal)/ 200mg pancreatin 10X made my abdomen pain.
Probiotics (3bilion) made me have loose stools.
B vitamin complex improved my fatigue a bit, but no further improvements.
Digestin by JM (pancreatin 30mg,diastase 20mg, papin (papain?) 40mg, lysine HCl100mg, vitamin B-1 10mg) improved my fat malabsorption for 1 time out of about 7 times.
2.2 Western medicine
Haven’t have any stool tests
Haven’t drunk milk/ soy milk added with calcium daily
Fatty liver diagnosed by ultrasound. gallbladder scanned with no findings
Gastroenterologist: gastritis diagnosed in 2017 (shouldn’t have now).
Neurology: performed nerve conduction study and then excluded Myasthenia gravis
CT brain with no findings
Endocrinology: excluded Cushing's syndrome
psychiatry：citalopram (hbr) 20mg/ sertraline (HCl) 25mg/ aripiprazole 2.5mg made me constipation & didn’t help
X-ray on chest, back & neck
2.3 Homepathy
Sulphur Q1 (don’t work)
2.4 Chinese medicine
Chinese herbals (45%) & acupuncture (5%) alleviated half of my fatigue but no further improvements. Chinese herbals alleviated my diarrhoea.

3. Onset
Roughly from September 2009 to May 2011, I ate too much tortoise jelly [made from the gao/ paste of plastron (bottom shell) from the turtle & chinese herbs with cooling effects] & drank too much chinese herbal cooling tea 4 times a week for 1 month & 1 time a week for other time, to prevent acne. Masturbated 5 times for 1 week, 3 times a week for 2 weeks, 2 times a week for the other time.
From Sep 2012, started feeling weak
In May 2014, started getting severe fatigue
In June & july 2014, barely attended school. The result is getting more tired.
In Sep 2014, started to have diarrhea frequently
